Touying Template for UGE!
---

This project holds a [touying](https://touying-typ.github.io/) template to write presentations for the French Universit√© Gustave Eiffel using [Typst](https://typst.app/docs/).

Source and example can be found on this [gitlab repository](https://gitlab.inria.fr/ttoullie/touying-uge)

# How-to use

Use the following command to create a new project with this theme.

```
typst init @preview/touying-uge
```

## Documentation

Do not hesitate to have a look at the official documentation of [`Typst`](https://typst.app/docs/) and [`Touying`](https://touying-typ.github.io/docs/intro)! :book:
